statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerProfiles ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerProfiles ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_id = 'd5d62dc2-0f78-4b4f-a4d1-48aa70d55e04';
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_email FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE purchase_history->'items' @> '[{"product": "Laptop"}]';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerProfiles ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT jsonb_array_elements(purchase_history->'items')->>'product' AS product_name FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, amount FROM purchase_history WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT c.name, p.product_id FROM customer_profiles c JOIN purchase_history p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, name, purchase_date FROM customer_profiles JOIN purchase_history ON customer_profiles.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE price > 100.00;
SELECT customer_id, recommended_product, recommendation_score FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.8 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John'
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, product_name, price FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY price DESC

SELECT c.first_name, p.product_name, r.recommended_product FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN recommendations r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id WHERE r.recommendation_score > 0.8
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, product_name, purchase_date FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, recommended_product_id, score FROM recommendations WHERE score > 4.0;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, email, age FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT p.product_name, p.category, pr.price FROM products p JOIN purchases pu ON p.product_name = pu.product_name JOIN customers c ON pu.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE c.age > 30;
SELECT c.name AS customer_name, pr.product_name, rec.score FROM customers c JOIN recommendations rec ON c.customer_id = rec.customer_id JOIN products pr ON rec.recommended_product_id = pr.product_id;
SELECT c.name AS customer_name, pu.product_name, pu.price FROM customers c JOIN purchases pu ON c.customer_id = pu.customer_id WHERE c.gender = 'Female' AND pu.price > 100 ORDER BY pu.price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, product_name, price, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT c.first_name, p.product_name, r.date_created FROM customers c JOIN recommendations r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id JOIN products p ON r.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS purchase_count FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
